plot: Coarse-to-Fine Q-attention with Learned Path Ranking
summary: Learned Path Ranking (LPR) is a method that accepts an end-effector goal pose, and learns to rank a set of goal-reaching paths. C2F-ARM+LPR is added as an extension to the existing system. LPR retains sample efficiency of its predecessor, while also being able to accomplish a larger set of tasks.
